Package com.example.scanpal

Class EventController

java.lang.Object
com.example.scanpal.EventController
public class EventController extends Object
Handles operations related to event management in a Firestore database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventController()
    Constructs an EventController with a reference to a Firestore database.

    getEventsByUser(android.view.View view, EventFetchByUserCallback callback)

    • getEventsByUser

      public void getEventsByUser(android.view.View view, EventFetchByUserCallback callback)
      This will give back an arrayList of event Type, consisting of events created by the current user (user is obtained from usercontroller.getuser())

    • getEventById

      public void getEventById(String EventID, EventFetchCallback callback)
      gives an event object from database given its ID
      Parameters:
      EventID - the events document ID
      callback - the organizer

    • editEventById

      public void editEventById(String EventID, Event event)
      edits an existing event in database given its ID
      Parameters:
      EventID - the event to edit
      event - the new details for the existing event
